text:
Want an adventure? We're hiring at Ensibuuko, based in Kampala Uganda, and Canadian backed.

Ensibuuko equalizing access to banking through mobile in Africa.

Visa included, previous applicants have spent 12-18 months living and working in Kampala.

Looking for: Int DevOps (https://frontierfoundry.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mo9d/) Senior Dev (https://frontierfoundry.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mo93/)
